bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard High Voltage (Above 1000 V) Tests Techniques
Partial Discharges Measurements
IEEE Draft Standard High Voltage (Above 1000 V) Tests Techniques - Partial Discharges Measurements
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.301/D3 R1, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard adopts the IEC 60270-2000-12 and defines methods of measuring partial discharges that may occur in energized power switchgear apparatus, in flaws, voids and interfaces of non-self rstoring insulation that may then result in dielectric failure of the switchgear

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
